dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Welcome aboard, greenhorn! You are able-bodied and ready for the voyage, I trust?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Do not dilly-dally! If I see one slacker among you, I'll tie them to the mast myself! It's a morning, not a mourning; look alive, men!

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: How do you like the taste of that Mermaid fin jerky? You better enjoy it. It'll be our main source of sustenance for a good while. Heh.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: The hour may be late, but do not let your guard down. The Waves can come crashing in at any moment—day or night. Keep your eyes wide open, am I clear?

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: We do not fear the unfathomable horrors of the sea! Stand tall! Give them a toothy grin and a wild guffaw! That is what it means to be a crew of the Pequod!

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: None shall enter the Captain's quarters! If you have something to share—share it with the navigator. I grow tired of listening to fools whining, cowering at the Waves of the Great Lake.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg:
Whales are... magnificent yet mysterious monsters. Consider it a great honor that you are allowed to hunt them beside me...
Hah, I daresay that my fervor for Whaling is unmatched!

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: Harpooneers! Fasten your harpoons! Helmsmen, right hard rudder! OARSMEN!! Pull yourselves together and ROW!!!

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
All hands, heed my command! ... Our finest hour is upon us! Tonight, we hunt the Whale!
Tonight, we hunt the All-Withering Crimson Whale!

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Thunder and lightning... Yes, the battle of our lifetimes will soon be upon us! We will hunt the Whale of all evils! Hahahahahaha!

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Haah... These are good winds. I enjoy this particular calm before the storm.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Set course toward the Whale.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Light the gases and fire up the engines!

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Focus on the Whale if you have the time to flap your gums!

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: All hands! CHARGE!

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Our foes cower! This is our opportunity to turn the tide!

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Hngh...! Hold your stations! The foe has its eyes on me—use this opportunity to strike them!

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Good! Do not stop until we have slaughtered every last one of them! We shall seek no respite until it is done!

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: I-I am Captain Ishmael! I will not fall... here...!

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Of course. Has my compass ever led you astray?

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: Dammit... The fault lies with you, Manager!

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: Hail not at this mediocre outcome! Set your sights beyond this puerile victory; our Whale is greater, more evil than this!

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Not bad, not bad at all... But we are still yet to reach the Whale! Fire the gas turbines again, men! And—

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: You useless wretches! You dare fall to your knees here? I do not recall ordering any of you to be defeated!
